Text: This demo battle is for showcasing the battle gameplay of the game.
It is not related to any historical battles in particular, but it borrows leaders and units from Norman and Saxon during the High Medieval era.
This demo has only a quite simple AI function and many graphic assets are placeholder.
The first release version will feature 3 campaigns involving Norman, Ancient Egypt, and Ottoman Empire.
Please feel free to provide any feedback or idea for improvement on the game.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
